title: Limu Cafe and Bistro
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Western, Juice bar, Fusion
description: A family-run restaurant serves breakfast all day with vegan options (sandwiches and brotchen), fresh juices, coffee with no extra fees for soy milk/almond milk. Serves a vegan lunch all day from 12-9pm and includes soup, salads, wraps, main dishes, cakes, cookies. On Sundays serves only breakfast, coffee, cake and snacks. No Wi-Fi. Friendly family atmosphere. Dogs are welcome.
